qoutes.quoute: There is always something ridiculous about the emotions of people whom one has ceased to love.
qoutes.author: Oscar Wilde

qoutes.quoute: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
qoutes.author: Allen Klein

qoutes.quoute: It always seems impossible until it's done.
qoutes.author: Nelson Mandela

qoutes.quoute: If you don't ask, you don't get.
qoutes.author: Stevie Wonder

qoutes.quoute: But love's a malady without a cure.
qoutes.author: John Dryden

qoutes.quoute: I believe firmly in God's control in life.
qoutes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

qoutes.quoute: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
qoutes.author: Erich Fromm

qoutes.quoute: We are involved in a life that passes understanding and our highest business is our daily life.
qoutes.author: John Cage

qoutes.quoute: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.
qoutes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

qoutes.quoute: Get correct views of life, and learn to see the world in its true light. It will enable you to live pleasantly, to do good, and, when summoned away, to leave without regret.
qoutes.author: Robert E. Lee
